channel.title: [Minor] Remove threads from "Show new replies to your posts"
channel.description:
Hello, please add the ability to remove threads from "Show new replies to your posts"
Sometimes I post in a thread and then when I get a response I don't really care about that thread anymore, it's really annoying to see that link constantly pop up in "Show new replies to your posts" and it would be very nice to be able to stop it from showing up
Thankyou for your time

item.title: [Minor] Remove threads from "Show new replies to your posts"
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Justin Bieber:

I suggested this over 4 years ago and the official response was: stop replying faget just go and delete all of your posts in the topic.

“Suck it up faggot! Stay in your league!” - Kim Jong-Il

Read full topic
item.source: [Minor] Remove threads from "Show new replies to your posts"

item.title: [Minor] Remove threads from "Show new replies to your posts"
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“Whackatre, post:4, topic:543190”]np op

Difference is I have the anime avatar and we all know how much Tom loves anime…

Oh, okay.

Let’s actually do this though.[/quote]

Find a mod or write some code and fix it. :eek:

Read full topic
